• Reference

Survival Learner

Source: R/LearnerSurv.R

This Learner specializes Learner for survival analysis tasks.

Format

R6Class object inheriting from Learner.

Usage

See Learner.

Examples

library(mlr3)
ids = mlr_learners$keys("^surv")
lrns = mlr_learners$mget(ids)
names(lrns)
#> [1] "surv.rpart"

# get a specific learner from mlr_learners:
lrn = mlr_learners$get("surv.rpart")
print(lrn)
#> <LearnerSurvRpart:surv.rpart>
#> Parameters: list()
#> Packages: rpart
#> Predict Type: risk
#> Feature types: logical, integer, numeric, character, factor, ordered
#> Properties: missings
#> 
#> Public: clone(), fallback, feature_types, hash, id, importance(),
#>   model, packages, param_set, params(), predict_type, predict_types,
#>   predict(), properties, selected_features(), task_type, train()
